info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Berkshire County through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lee, or 8 miles east of Great Barrington, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban/poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Lee, Lenox, Becket, Dalton, Hinsdale, Monterey, Peru, Washington, Tyringham, North Otis, New Lenox, Lakeview Terrace, Lenox Dale, The Boulders, The Center At Lenox, Adams Junction, Yankee Orchards, Wheatleigh and Victory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
